title: I don't have enough IP?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I need help! :( Also my friend keeps saying I should have 400 RP to start off to buy level boosts, do you guys not use that anymore?

replies.body: Sorry for the confusion, but Riot removed the 400 RP bonus and replaced it with a free Premium Hextech Chest + Key at level 5. The chest will contain Ashe, Garen, and a skin for one. http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp
w hy: ( I dont want ashe/garen ;C ask them to revert it pls. I want lvl 30!!!
They also halved the required experience to reach level 30 around the same time, so it is much easier to get there now than it was with the 400 RP.

It looks like your IP balance wasn't properly synced with the server, thus wasn't displaying your proper IP balance. A simple restart of the client should update it. 

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Sorry for not replying so soon, I told Deep Terror Nami that it was fixed with a simple restart of the client. Another question, I'm watching Night Blue 3 atm, and there is the new emoticons you guys released and there are a blue/pink/green type, I think you guys should give it an animation, it'd be pretty cool and more worth too have instead investing so many shards for a emoticon, cuz it doesn't seem very worth :C
